text:
@GregAbbott_TX CORONAVIRUS 
Coronavirus infection can be treated by buffering lungs to pH 6-7 and blood to pH 7 using sodium bicarbonate. Coronavirus needs pH 4-5 to infect lung cells. Nobody is doing it. Nobody has thought of it. Let doctors know.
